item.title: About Chris Albon
item.description: I am the Director of Data Science at Devoted Health, using data science and machine learning to help fix America’s health care system. Previously, I was Director of Data Science at the Kenyan startup BRCK, cofounded Yonder, created the data science podcast Partially Derivative, was the Director of Data Science at the humanitarian non-profit Ushahidi, and was the director of the low-resource technology governance project at FrontlineSMS. I also wrote Machine Learning For Python Cookbook (O’Reilly 2018) and created Machine Learning Flashcards.
